job_history.role_name: Combat Marksmanship Trainer/ Primary Marksmanship Instructor
job_history.work_description: Instructed over 2,000 Marines in all phases of the Marine Corps Marksmanship Program on the qualification and re qualification on small arms ranges. Additionally, assisted in the operation of 35 firing ranges.

Assisted four Martial Arts Instructors with the training of over 200 Marines and Sailors in the Marine Corps Martial Arts Program by planning and executing Combat Conditioning (Physical Fitness Training). Conducted remediation training with students who required extra attention until they met the requirements to successfully obtain their next belt.

Analyzed difficulties of over 3,000 shooters during dry and live fire exercises in all phases of the Marine Corps Marksmanship Program during qualification. Additionally, assisted in the operation of 56 firing ranges.

Organized the set-up of a large scale amphibious assault landing training exercise/ simulation involving several adjacent Marine Crops units. Trained 50 Marines to use combat simulation programs and to effectively support adjacent units involved in the exercise.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Demonstrated leadership skills by training and instructing large groups of Marines and Sailors in various roles, including Combat Marksmanship Trainer and Assistant Martial Arts Instructor.

skills.name: Instructor/Training
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in instructing and training over 2,000 Marines in marksmanship and martial arts programs, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Marksmanship
skills.explanation: Highly experienced in marksmanship training and coaching, with a strong focus on the Marine Corps Marksmanship Program, indicating expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Martial Arts
skills.explanation: Significant experience in martial arts instruction and training, with a focus on the Marine Corps Martial Arts Program, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Organized and set up a large-scale amphibious assault landing training exercise, demonstrating solid project management skills.

skills.name: Team Management
skills.explanation: Trained and managed teams of Marines in various roles, showing solid team management skills.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Effectively communicated with large groups of Marines and Sailors, demonstrating strong communication skills.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Analyzed difficulties of over 3,000 shooters during dry and live fire exercises, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills.
